entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
